thread.title: Trafalgar Soft Launches A New Fun Addictive Role Playing Online Game “AlfaFly: Mythos Quest.”
thread.title_full: Trafalgar Soft Launches A New Fun Addictive Role Playing Online Game “AlfaFly: Mythos Quest.”

author: Warayuth Songsungthong
title: Trafalgar Soft Launches A New Fun Addictive Role Playing Online Game “AlfaFly: Mythos Quest.”
text:
The developers at Trafalgar Soft wanted to come up with an innovative concept that not only provides an interesting and fun background for a storyline, but also something that would interest people of different age groups. Therefore, AlfaFly: Mythos Quest came into being. It is an addictive role play game that is soon to be launched for the iOS platform all over the world. The game has been inspired from some of the most classic characters in the area of gaming. It allows the gamers to go on an adventure with the underlying aim of recovering a number of stolen artifacts. The only way gamers can save the Kingdom of Mythos is by recovering the lost artifacts.
A key member from the development team was Quote: d as saying, “Recovering these artifacts is not as easy as it seems. One will have to prepare for an unforgettable fight as they try to save themselves from too many obstacles. This game also needs gamers to compete with their friends on social media platforms like Facebook.”
One can choose from a wide range of classic game characters each boasting of a different feature that can help them advance in the game at different and interesting pace. Some of the characters that are available in AlfaFly: Mythos Quest includes the following:
1. Aladdin and his signature flying carpet.
2. Luca who belongs to the forests of the West and is a good witch.
3. Rumpelstiltskin , the dwarf known for his golden touch.
4. Valkyrie, a winged warrior. He hails from the land beyond.
5. Hades, a kind hearted yet grumpy Lord of the Underworld.
Together these characters are called the Legendary Five and they are the only hope when it comes to saving the Kingdom of Mythos. The Vita Stone is an extremely essential aspect of the game and collecting it can give players the much-needed safety and harmony for the Kingdom. However, the stone is in the possession of the evil dark wizard Morgana.
The storyline that has been used for AlfaFly: Mythos Quest keeps the players focused on the steps that need to be taken to proceed through the game. It helps keep them connected to the game, which makes it an enjoyable experience. Some of the features of this game that make it a standout include:
1.Graphics:
The graphics for the game are of exceptional standards. An immense amount of care and effort has gone into differentiating each character and designing the exotic locales to pique the player’s interest. The vibrant color schemes bring the game to life.
2. Different interesting levels:
There are 13 levels in the game, each with their own set of obstacles and difficulty levels. Some of the locales that one is likely to come across when playing AlfaFly: Mythos Quest includes castles, forests, deserts, beaches, volcanoes, outer space and so on.
3. Classic Characters:
All of the 5 characters included in the game have a unique back-story and therefore, the players have the chance to select the back-story that appeals most to them. This enables them to connect with their characters.
4. Sidekicks:
Every character is assigned a helpful sidekick who makes it easier to overcome the obstacles and get one step closer to the goal.
5. Inventive Game play:
The main feature of this game is its flying aspect and in addition to this, one can also use magical bursts that can be fired at the enemies.
6. Different levels of difficulty:
Every step of the way, there will be an increase in the difficulty level to keep the gaming atmosphere exciting, competitive and full of adrenaline rush.
7. Health Meter:
The health meter in the game helps one keep a track of their life status in the game. Getting hit by enemies and obstacles shows a decline in the meter whereas a subsequent health gain shows an increase in the meter.
In addition to these exciting features, AlfaFly: Mythos Quest also comes with the option to play with Facebook friends and it can thereby increase the joy and sense of adventure.
App detail.
App Name: AlfaFly: Mythos Quest Cost: free Platform: iOS exclusive, universal iOS device. Category: games, Family , Role Playing, Second category: entertainment. Appropriate for all ages

About Company: Trafalgar Soft is an app development company for both utility application and game application which now emphasize on developing app for iOS platform but they will work on android in the future. The company was founded on Oct 2014. Warayuth Songsungthong (Wayne) is the founder and CEO. This is a small company from Thailand, however, it emphasizes on developing the best quality apps.
